title: The Geist2k Bug 8/23: Drake, Hurricane Henri, Green Flag Movies, Respect Biden, Alex Jones, Ben Shapiro, Jay-Z
itunes:title: The Geist2k Bug 8/23: Drake, Hurricane Henri, Green Flag Movies, Respect Biden, Alex Jones, Ben Shapiro, Jay-Z
description:
In this edition of The Geist2k Bug, Jack and Miles discuss Drake getting doxxed by Kanye, Hurricane Henri making landfall, 'Green Flag Movies', the 'Respect Biden' hashtag, Alex Jones calling Trump a 'dumbass' for getting the vaccine, Ben Shapiro's nuaced take on vaccine refusal, and Jay-Z and Beyonce posing with a never before seen Basquiat painting in Tiffany & Co. ad

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
